Sun Tzu Class Heavy Cruiser Refit (Military Starship)

The Sun Tzu was one of the more successful pre-war IGN designs. The only major problem experienced in combat was that the spinal particle accelerator was not as effective as originally envisioned, and a program was undertaken after the war to refit some of the vessels with a spinal meson gun. This modified version, shown below, had a refit cost of MCr700.
